name: Job Search Help
description: Get free help with conducting a job search. They offer assistance on how to write a good resume and clear cover letters, plus tell you about interviewing techniques. They can also provide information about worker rights, referrals for job training, and career fairs. Get help with: Creating a strong resume or update your current one Write a convincing cover letter that highlights your strengths Prepare for your interview Find job openings on employment websites Fill out applications online Set up
